sen.j: 正暦3年（992年）勘解由使次官、翌年には衛門府に任じられ、長徳2年（996年）には従五位上に列して加賀国国司、長保元年（999年）には備中国権介を兼務している。
sen.e: He was assigned Kageyushinosuke (Vice-minister of the Office of Investigators of the Records of Outgoing Officials) in 992, and Saemon no gon no suke (provisional assistant captain of the Left Division of Outer Palace Guards) in the following year, and further, he was ranked as Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth rank, Upper Grade) and served as Provincial Governor of Kaga Province, and doubled as Junior Governor of Bicchu Province in 999.

sen.j: 明法道の学者といえども自宅での講義には天皇の宣旨による許可が必要とされており、実際にこれを許されたのは平安前期の讃岐永直、允亮の曽祖父（祖父とも）である惟宗直本とこの時の允亮の3例のみであり、前年の令宗賜姓と並んで彼の社会的名声が破格のものであった事を示している。
sen.e: Even a scholar of Myobodo needed a permission by Emperor's decree for a lecture at home, and only SANUKI no Naganao in the early Heian Period, Tadasuke's great-grandfather (or grandfather) KOREMUNE no Naomoto, and Tadasuke that time were actually permitted for this, which shows his social prestige was exceptional, like the grant of Yoshimune in the previous year also does.

sen.e: Jushiinoge was a same rank with an Onmyoji (diviner), ABE no Seimei who died in the previous year of this appointment, and considering it was unprecedented appointment for the both families of that time, this shows his social prestige was high.
